short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View Stack Exchange answers ordered by actual vote count.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of seeing top answers with −10 votes because they were marked "accepted"? Now you can view answers ordered by actual vote count.

Works across all Stack Exchange communities including:

- Stack Overflow
- Super User
- Ask Ubuntu
- Server Fault
- Unix & Linux
- Arqade
- etc.
